reviewText:
Indeed, the Ultimate Ninja Challenge is in the mind of the viewer. This unparalled film by Joel Law takes us, the viewers, into the dark realms of the Hong Kong underground circa 1947. With a brilliant cast, masterfully written screenplay, and moving soundtrack, this film is a testament to the invisible ninjas that protect Hong Kong from prostitution, drug trade, and general thuggery.
"Have you seen our butts," indeed.
